original_text: Then the crowd there turned on Sosthenes the synagogue leader and beat him in front of the proconsul; and Gallio showed no concern whatever.
korean_text: 모든 사람이 회당장 소스데네를 잡아 법정 앞에서 때리되 갈리오가 이 일을 상관하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the crowd there turned on Sosthenes
and beat him in front of the proconsul
and Gallio showed no concern whatever
